edu.packt.neuralnet.math

Interface IActivationFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HyperTan, Linear, Sigmoid, Step

    public interface IActivationFunction
    This interface represents the activation function applicable to the neural network. Any activation function should implement this interface in order to be used in neural computation.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Alan de Souza, Fabio Soares

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IActivationFunction.ActivationFunctionENUM
      This enumeration lists some of the common used activation functions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calc(double x)
      This is the core method for calculating the activation function's value
      double derivative(double x)
      This is the core method for calculating the activation function's derivative value

    • Method Detail

      • calc

        double calc(double x)
        This is the core method for calculating the activation function's value
        Parameters:
        input - value
        Returns:
        returns the result of the activation function given x

      • derivative

        double derivative(double x)
        This is the core method for calculating the activation function's derivative value
        Parameters:
        input - value
        Returns:
        returns the derivative result of the activation function given x
